bib.title: New algorithm for mapping soil moisture by coupling Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 images
bib.author: Nicolas Baghdadi and Mohammad El Hajj and Mehrez Zribi and Hassan Bazzi
bib.abstract: New algorithm for mapping soil moisture by coupling Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 images Nicolas Baghdadi1, Mohammad El Hajj1, Mehrez Zribi2, Hassan Bazzi1 1 IRSTEA, University of Montpellier, UMR TETIS, 34093 Montpellier CEDEX 5, France; 2 CESBIO (CNRS/UPS/IRD/CNES), 31401 Toulouse CEDEX 9, France; nicolas. baghdadi@ teledetection. fr (NB); mohammad. el-hajj@ teledetection. fr (MEH); mehrez. zribi@ ird. fr (MZ); hassan. abdel-nasser-bazzi@ teledetection. fr Soil moisture is a key parameter regulating the earth water cycle since it is a function of the rates of soil evaporation and precipitation. SAR data in the C-and X-bands were widely and primarily used to estimate soil moisture (mv) over bare soils and soils covered with vegetation. The arrival of Sentinel-1 (S1) and Sentinel-2 (S2) satellites have encouraged the development of an operational algorithm for soil moisture mapping over …
